message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I really like the product, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me in the middle?

Bob, I appreciate your offer and your willingness to negotiate.  I'm happy to meet you halfway, but $10,500 is still a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,000.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let me know if you're interested.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $11,000, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,800, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at this price?
